  • Uses of ChildToParentMap in no.uib.triogen.model.mendelian_error

    Methods in no.uib.triogen.model.mendelian_error with parameters of type ChildToParentMap 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static double MendelianErrorEstimator.estimateMendelianErrorPrevalence​(GenotypesProvider genotypesProvider, ChildToParentMap childToParentMap)
    Estimates the prevalence of Mendelian errors by comparing the number of 001*, *100, 110*, *011 resulting in +2 or -1 alternative alleles for the parents compared to the number of such trios expected according to the maf.
